data.title: DPAC Official Site
data.meta_description: DPAC has progressed to becoming the live entertainment center for all of North Carolina with eight incredible seasons and several sold out shows.
data.text:
Event History

Year after year of incredible events

Since opening in 2008, DPAC has become established as the center for live entertainment in North Carolina. From Greensboro to Durham, Chapel Hill to Cary, to Raleigh and east to the coast, audiences from throughout the region come to the 200+ performances the center hosts each season.

Annually DPAC places in the top five theaters in the U.S. as tracked by multiple industry-leading trade magazines with attendance topping 550,000 guests per season.
